headline: Garmin introduces Varia Vue, its first cycling headlight with a built-in 4K camera
summary: Garmin (NYSE: GRMN) today announced the Varia™ Vue headlight camera, the latest addition to its lineup of accessories designed to help increase safety and visibility for cyclists riding on roadways. Complete with a 4K front-facing camera (requires memory card; not included1) that saves video automatically if an incident is detected2, plus a 600-lumen headlight, Varia Vue boasts a range of premium features to provide cyclists with greater peace of mind – all while maintaining impressive battery l
